item.title: Craft a Complete Test Automation Strategy
item.description: In this white paper, we explain how to put together an effective test automation strategy that blends scripted and codeless automated tests, enabling customers to scale testing with apps.

metaGlobalVars.seoTitle: How to Craft a Smart Test Automation Strategy
metaGlobalVars.seoDescription: As codeless automation gains traction, you should learn to blend it with scripted tests in your test automation strategy. This white paper explains how.

item.title: Introducing the Applause Quality Score™
item.description: Applause Quality Score ratings enable users to assess the effectiveness and thoroughness of their structured and exploratory tests build-over-build to make informed release decisions.

metaGlobalVars.seoTitle: AQS Ratings Provide Clear Picture of Digital Quality
metaGlobalVars.seoDescription: The Applause Quality Score offers first-of-its-kind ratings that enable users to track digital quality trends for structured and exploratory test cases.

item.title: Integrated Functional Testing in a QA strategy
item.description: Test automation has its benefits and limitations. With Integrated Functional Testing, you get the best of both worlds: manual testing expertise and automation for simpler test cases.

metaGlobalVars.seoTitle: Integrated Functional Testing in a QA strategy
metaGlobalVars.seoDescription: With Applause’s Integrated Functional Testing, you can blend automated and manual testing in a holistic QA strategy. Learn how.

item.title: Your Keys to Combating Bias in AI
item.description: Whether intended or not, bias is built into every AI engine. See where you need to be vigilant and the steps you can take to eliminate bias from your AI initiatives.

item.title: The 2019 Retail Quality Report
item.description: Applause tested the digital experiences of more than 50 top global retailers this holiday season, finding over 3,000 bugs.

item.title: Driving ROI with Accessibility: Get Closer to Your Customer with Crowdtesting
item.description: Discover how Applause helps companies solve their most common accessibility challenges, resulting in impactful ROI.

item.title: Testing Essentials for Five-Star Voice Experiences
item.description: Learn the best practices of voice testing, driving great voice experiences using real-world and automated testing.

item.title: 4 Retail Strategies to Gain and Retain Customers
item.description: Retailers need quality control over their digital deployments and can look to crowdtesting to lower risk, save money, and improve customer retention and conversion rates.

item.title: How Does Your QA Stand Up to Agile?
item.description: Journey through the evolution of QA and see whether your current practices stand up to the Agile standard.

item.title: Driving ROI in Banking: Get Closer to Your Customer with Crowdtesting
item.description: Discover how retail banks can drive massive ROI with Applause's crowdsourced QA services.

item.title: Driving ROI in Media: Get Closer to Your Customer with Crowdtesting
item.description: Discover how media organizations can drive massive ROI with Applause's crowdsourced QA services.

item.title: Driving ROI in Retail: Get Closer to Your Customer with Crowdtesting
item.description: How retail organizations can drive massive ROI with Applause's crowdsourced QA services.

item.title: Automation and Manual Testing: Striking the Right Balance
item.description: Learn how to balance automation and manual testing to accelerate your agile development team.

item.title: Driving ROI Through Crowdsourced Testing
item.description: A third-party research report on the value of Applause's crowdtesting services.

item.title: The Essential Guide To Agile Testing
item.description: Discover why the hottest startups and established enterprises are turning their focus to agile development.

item.title: Crowdtesting 101
item.description: Find out why it's time to start rethinking your QA lab to meet the demands of the digital world.

item.title: The Essential Guide To Mobile App Testing
item.description: To effectively test mobile apps, now and into the future, enterprises must ensure a strong user experience from the beginning. Here's how to implement an effective mobile testing strategy.

metaGlobalVars.seoTitle: Essential guide to mobile app testing
metaGlobalVars.seoDescription: A poor mobile user experience can have lasting effects on a business. In this mobile app testing guide, learn how to address functional and usability issues.

item.title: Crowdsourced Usability Testing
item.description: In the past, usability studies took months to complete. Today, UX testing can be done in weeks by companies of all sizes.
